title: THIS is how to balance zed
body:
Make him use mana.

It'll stop all the careless WQ combos. It'll stop free harrass. It'll make them more reserved with their mana.

Pls riot!

replies.body:
Or learn how to play laning phase against energy champs.

Pro-tip: They have to decide between killing minions with skills (so they don't take damage from going up to melee the creep) or trading harass with the enemy laner.
yeah i think lee sin should use mana as well. and trynd should lose his ult since he wont need it if he is using mana hur.
you are right here, zed is like kat they are just basically ranged, cos of their free harass, and Kat's one means you cant go near her for the next few seconds either
